UnifiedActivityParticipant.name: UnifiedActivityParticipant
UnifiedActivityParticipant.description: Represents a participant in an activity. For example, a participant in a voice call is someone who initiated the call or someone who received the call.

ActivityId.description: ID of the activity that the person participated in.

ChannelAddress.description: The channel-specific address used to identify the participant in an external communication. For example, an email address in an email or a phone number in a voice call. The value is captured at the time of the communication; it doesn’t change if the contact’s email address or phone number is updated later.

ParticipantType.description: The role of the participant in the activity.

PersonId.description: ID of the person who participated in the activity.
